title: You Call The Shots (Web-Based Training Course)
cleaned_text: Link You Call The Shots (Web-Based Training Course)Organization: [United States Centers for Disease Control (CDC)](/search?topic[]=239) "You Call the Shots is an interactive, web-based immunization training course. It consists of a series of modules that discuss vaccine-preventable diseases and explain the latest recommendations for vaccine use. Each module provides learning opportunities, self-test practice questions, reference and resource materials, and an extensive glossary." - You Call The Shots (Web-Based Training Course) Ratings submitted by CANVax users for this resource are tallied to provide an average resource rating per category.
